text: Any chance of giving me some guidance, I looked at the documentation but I reached my limitation.

You need to go to the create a task endpoint to create the task, and then associate the task with the right deal using another endpoint, or you can create them all at once and then associate, however you prefer. To associate, there is an endpoint for that and you will need the association ID between tasks and deals which you can get making another API call. I'm a bit busier, you can dm me with more details of what you are dealing with if you want and I'll give you a hand

Not having luck with the search API with trying to filter search results to just certain content of the site that is tagged with hidden text. The results are too open where similar items get pulled in that shouldn't. Adjusting the minscore doesn't seem to be doing anything. Any suggestions to tighten down the search results?

I want to create app setting page.
Not showing any buttons <https://prnt.sc/J1pUfTYWUaZo>
I have used this <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/create-an-app-settings-page>
